mapper.update:
update tbl_tran
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expected_date = #{expectedDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR},
stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=CHAR},
contacts_id = #{contactsId,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_tran set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expected_date = #{expectedDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=CHAR}, contacts_id = #{contactsId,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran( id, owner, money, name, expected_date, customer_id, stage, activity_id, contacts_id, create_by, create_time,type,source,next_contact_time,contact_summary,description) values (#{id},#{ owner},#{ money},#{ name},#{ expectedDate},#{ customerId},#{ stage},#{ activityId},#{ contactsId},#{ createBy},#{ createTime},#{type},#{source},#{nextContactTime},#{contactSummary},#{description})
mapper.select: select t.id, u1.name as owner, t.money, t.name, t.expected_date,cus.name as customer_id,dv1.value as stage,dv3.value as type,dv2.value as source, a.name as activity_id, con.fullname as contacts_id, u2.name as create_by, t.create_time, u3.name as edit_by, t.edit_time, t.description, t.contact_summary, t.next_contact_time from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u1 on u1.id=t.owner join tbl_user u2 on u2.id=t.create_by left join tbl_user u3 on u3.id=t.edit_by left join tbl_activity a on a.id= t.activity_id left join tbl_customer cus on cus.id= t.customer_id left join tbl_contacts con on con.id= t.contacts_id left join tbl_dic_value dv1 on dv1.id=t.stage left join tbl_dic_value dv2 on dv2.id=t.source left join tbl_dic_value dv3 on dv3.id=t.type where t.id=#{tranId}
select count(*) as value,dv.value as name from tbl_tran tran join tbl_dic_value dv on dv.id=tran.stage group by tran.stage

select t.id,t.money,t.name, t.expected_date,dv1.value as stage,dv2.value as type from tbl_tran t left join tbl_dic_value dv1 on dv1.id=t.stage left join tbl_dic_value dv2 on dv2.id=t.type where t.customer_id=#{id}

mapper.select: select tr.id, tr.owner, tr.money, tr.name, tr.expected_date, cus.name as customer_id , dv1.value as stageName , tr.stage, tr.type, tr.source, act.name as activityName,tr.activity_id ,con.fullname as contactsName,tr.contacts_id, tr.description, tr.contact_summary, tr.next_contact_time from tbl_tran tr left join tbl_customer cus on cus.id=tr.customer_id left join tbl_dic_value dv1 on dv1.id=tr.stage left join tbl_activity act on act.id=tr.activity_id left join tbl_contacts con on con.id=tr.contacts_id where tr.id=#{id}
